description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Play single player or online with three other people in a co-operative zombie hunt through 19 levels.  Rid the city of the zombie horde while collecting weapons, ammo, smashing crates, and avoiding exploding barrels.
description.short: Play single player or online with three other people in a co-operative zombie hunt through 19 levels.  Rid the city of the zombie horde while collecting weapons, ammo, smashing crates, and avoiding exploding barrels.
